summary_gpt: The company announced changes to its Key Managerial Personnel (KMP) details, effective from May 1, 2025, including contact information for the new KMPs. The updates were approved by the Board of Directors and are being disclosed to the stock exchanges and on the company's website.

Keva announced the resignation of Mr. Rohit Saraogi as Company Secretary and Compliance Officer, and appointed Ms. Deepti Chandratre to the same position effective May 1, 2025. The changes were approved by the Board of Directors during their meeting on April 30, 2025.

Keva announced the resignation of Mr. Rohit Saraogi as Company Secretary and Compliance Officer, and appointed Ms. Deepti Chandratre to the same position effective May 1, 2025, with additional responsibilities as Global Legal Counsel. The changes were approved by the Board of Directors during their meeting on April 30, 2025.
